name: Attraction (SoupScythe)
description:
Kaite Krush's Quest to become the Queen of the beach by making the tan hunks fall in love with her and avoiding the sun-burned losers.

 Because she has the power by moving the mouse she can make boys move closer to it. 

She also moves to the mouse cursor. And she uses it to pick up power-ups. She must to this mouse magnet power to JOIN TOGETHER with as many hunks as possible.

She knows some is in love with her because they stop moving and turn pink.
